title: UNP LEADER RANIL WICKRAMASINGHE EVEN DOES NOT  KNOW ABOUT KAPILAVASTHU BUDDHA RELICS
content: Onlanka News – (A comment by Walter Jayawardhana) Now it is clear that that the UNP leader Ranil Wickrmasinghe cannot make any statement related to the long history of the Sinhala people or Buddhism without becoming the laughing stock of the Sri Lankan people….
